text.description: `Required`. The text will be shown in the `Tag`

testId.description: ID used to locate the element in unit test suites

style.description: Custom styling applicable for specific cases

color.description: Color based on bulma's color tokens

isLight.description: Will adjust the selected color with a ligther style

isRounded.description: Will add round borders to tag's shape

withDelete.description: Will add a delete button (for both single or addon cases)

withAddon.description: Will add a second tag element (that could have its own text, color and delete)

addonText.description: The text will be shown in the tag's addon

addonColor.description: Color on tag's addon based on bulma's color tokens

onDeleteClick.description: Click function for `delete` option, alone does not nothing, but can be reused for other components
